summary: In a Kyrgyz village, five older women adopt an infant foundling. Jump ahead about 12 years: the boy, Beshkempir, is entering puberty, the age, his granny says, when life goes berserk. He ... See full summary Â»
cast: Mirlan Abdykalykov|Adir Abilkassimov|Mirlan Cinkozoev|Bakit Dzhylkychiev|Albina Imasheva|Talai Mederov
director: Director: Aktan Arym Kubat (as Aktan Abdykalykov)
title: Beshkempir
